name: Scroll rss excerpt
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2012/08/04/scroll-rss-excerpt-wordpress-plugin/

  • Live Demo
  • More info
  • Comments/Suggestion

This is a user requested plugin. with this plugin we can setup the RSS slider in our website. in the slider we can configure the title and excerpt. In plugin administration page, we have option to manage RSS link. maximum we can enter four RSS link in the administration page. we can use widget option or short code option to display the slider in the front end.

Features of this plugin

  1. Easy installation and customization.
  2. Widget option for sidebar.
  3. Short code option for posts and pages.

http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2012/08/04/scroll-rss-excerpt-wordpress-plugin/
sections.installation:
Installation Instruction & Configuration

Installation Instruction
Configuration
Live demo
sections.faq:
Q1. Can i display my post title instead of RSS feed?

Yes, Please find my another plugin. Scroll post excerpt.

Q2. Can i increase the excerpt length of the slider?

Yes, Option available in the admin page.
sections.changelog:
1.0

First version

2.0

Tested up to 3.4.2
Option to add the scroll directly in the theme file.

2.1

Tested up to 3.5

3.0

Tested up to 3.6
Added some security feature.

3.1

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (scroll-rss-excerpt.po) available in the languages folder.

3.2

  1. Tested up to 3.9
  2. Now it using fetch_feed() wordpress method to load rss feed. (fetch_feed() uses the SimplePie and FeedCache functionality for retrieval and parsing and automatic caching)

3.3

  1. Tested up to 4.0

3.5

  1. Tested up to 4.2.2

3.6

  1. Tested up to 4.3

3.7

  1. Tested up to 4.4
  2. Text Domain slug has been added for Language Packs.

3.8

  1. Tested up to 4.5
  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

3.9

  1. Tested up to 4.6

4.0

  1. Tested up to 4.7

4.1

  1. Tested up to 4.8

4.2

  1. Tested up to 4.9

4.3

  1. Tested up to 5.1

4.4

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.

4.5

  1. Tested up to 5.3

4.6

  1. Tested up to 5.4

4.7

  1. Tested up to 5.5

4.8

  1. Tested up to 5.7

4.9

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use plugin short code in the widget.

5.0

  1. Tested up to 5.9
